SCRIPT.MSCRI:
: SWITCH &$PLATFORM# : CASE "WINDOWS" "&UC4RB_OSB_DOMAIN_HOME#\bin\setDomainEnv.cmd" : CASE "UNIX" if [ -z != $WEBLOGIC_HOME ] then . $WEBLOGIC_HOME/bin/setWLSEnv.sh error=$? export CLASSPATH=$CLASSPATH:$OSB_HOME/lib/sb-kernel-api.jar:$OSB_HOME/modules/com.bea.common.configfwk_1.7.0.0.jar:$OSB_HOME/lib/sb-kernel-impl.jar:$OSB_HOME/lib/alsb.jar else echo "WEBLOGIC_HOME is not set" error=1 fi
: OTHER : ENDSWITCH
